meta_description: Explore the range of services offered by Climate Tech Connect. From consortia creation to deal closing, we support your climate technology initiatives.

hero.title: Services
hero.description:
Beyond our membership and sponsorship options, we offer a range of paid services designed specifically to support founders. While these services are available to everyone, members may receive exclusive discounts.

By working closely with startups and investors, we've identified the biggest challenges in the ecosystem and crafted solutions to target & bridge those gapsâ€”helping founders navigate obstacles and achieve their goals faster.

Acting as a strategic connector, we leverage our widespread network & direct access to key industry players to create opportunities for growth.
